titles.title: A bill to amend the Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 to require an individual to register as a lobbyist under such Act if the individual is employed or retained by a client for making more than one lobbying contact over a 2-year period and to treat legislative, political, and strategic counseling in support of lobbying contacts as lobbying activity under such Act, and for other purposes.
CLEAN Act of 2018
CLEAN Act of 2018
Curtailing Lobbying and Empowering Americans for a New Politics Act of 2018
Curtailing Lobbying and Empowering Americans for a New Politics Act of 2018
CLEAN Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
